author: patrickl
msg: Set java.endorsed.dirs property to common/lib so that the XML parser in common/lib overrides the parser bundled with JDK 1.4. This behavior is needed for Tomcat to behave under JDK 1.4 like it currently behaves in JDK 1.3

author: patrickl
msg: Added common/lib jar files to CLASSPATH to fix Bugzilla bug 6108

author: patrickl
msg: Added jar files in common/lib and removed shared/lib to fix Bugzilla bug 6108
